modName: Adal Matar the Lost Stronghold - Fight Against the Thalmor I
summary:
Fight against the Thalmor and discover a new storyline leading to The Lost Orcish Stronghold of Adal Matar.Reach the Eastmarch Imperial Camp, or find the hidden Thalmor Advanced Camp, 
discover what the Thalmor is planning, and beat them on the go to Adal Matar!
descriptionHtml:
--------------------------------------------A MOD BY MAD FRENCHIE----------------------------------------

----------------------------------------FIGHT AGAINST THE THALMOR I-----------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------  ADAL MATAR  -----------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------VERSION : 1.1 DATE :10-04-2013----------------------------------

[youtube]y7E61XcbEW8[/youtube]

Fight against the Thalmor and discover a new storyline leading to The Lost Orcish Stronghold of Adal Matar.

---------------------------------------------DESCRIPTION-------------------------------------------------

- Hours of new gameplay, much more if you take your time to discover everything.

- This MOD is a part of \"Eastmarch Hold Location\" and is recognized by sidequests,
bounties, couriers and dragons.

- 3  new clearable dungeons, the Lost Ruins, the Thalmor advanced base camp,
and now the abandoned Adal Matar mine.

- A new awesome Stronghold Player House with a storyline to discover. 

- Every enemies, special Actors like the Thalmors secret agents, chests and loot objects, 
  are all levelled and respawning to keep it fun for a long time and for all type of player,
  of course, all the stronghold is a safe storage place and a playerhouse.

- 14 new designed, navmeshed and optimized wilderness zones to explore, 
  and 3 cells, that will lead you to the far end east of the map and a stronghold player house.

-The mod includes 2 new marriageable Orc followers, an ancient imperial legioner and 
  the beautest merchant orc girl of the game.

-----------------------------------------------HOW TO DO-------------------------------------------------

Reach the Eastmarch Imperial Camp, or find the hidden Thalmor Advanced Camp, 
discover what the Thalmor is planning, and beat them on the go to Adal Matar!

-----------------------------------------------BACKGROUND-----------------------------------------------

\"An Orc prisonner stammered to the Thalmor the existence of the lost Orcish Stronghold 
of Adal Matar, a supposed abandoned mighty place, blessed in the past by Malacath himself.\"

- I spent hours searching an unused mountain in Skyrim, to establish a spectacular 
  Orc stronghold with a bit of story and events around it ...
  ...to make the place living... and I found the perfect place. 

- You will have to climb hundreds of steps across the mountain, fighting enemies, 
   to reach the end of the map, offering you some impressive new mountain views 
   on the land of skyrim.

\"There is only two ways leading to Adal Matar, and both are crossing the way of the Thalmor.\"

-------------------------------------------F.A.Q AND IMPORTANT NOTES-----------------------------------------

- This mod is fully compatible with the Civil War Main Quest, no matter if started, 
  finished or whoever you choosed.

- Don\'t look after any quests here, everything here is about a detailed design, so Please take a moment to look around you, don\'t rush waiting for something to happen as All my pleasure in this work is about designing some new interactive environments, without any directive line, for more immersion.

- I\'m French, no one is perfect, so I apologise for any grammar faults or else. 

--------------------------------------------CREDITS----------------------------------------------

- Merci à la Confrérie-des-traducteurs, pour leurs traductions de mes mods en Français,
  et tout particulièrement à ALIENS.

- Thanks to my friend, [b]Foaman[/b], for his fantastic job cleaning 
  & testing all my mods :  he\\\'s my technical post-prod director.

- Thanks to Sir [b][url= http://www.youtube.com/user/Brodual?feature=watch]Brodual[/url][/b] for the awesome videos he\'s making for the Skyrim Community - And featuring all my mods.
Watch for his youtube channel : [b][url= http://www.youtube.com/user/Brodual?feature=watch]Daily Skyrim Mod Spotlight[/url][/b] 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
PLEASE ! ENDORSE !

[b]Thanks to all my suscribers.[/b]
[b][url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198014885739/myworkshopfiles/?72850]MadFrenchie.[/url][/b]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
